meanings.definition: Of or relating to the theater.
meanings.sent1: The actors wore colorful costumes for the theatrical performance.
meanings.sent2: The play had a lot of theatrical lighting and sound effects.
meanings.sent3: The children put on a theatrical show for their parents in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: Her gestures were so theatrical, it was like watching a live cartoon.
meanings.sent5: The theatrical atmosphere of the play made the audience feel like they were part of the story.

meanings.definition: Exaggerated or overly dramatic in behavior or style.
meanings.sent1: She gave a theatrical gasp when she saw the surprise party.
meanings.sent2: His theatrical gestures during the argument made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent3: The cat's theatrical meowing for treats always amused the family.
meanings.sent4: The storm outside mirrored her theatrical emotions.
meanings.sent5: The theatrical performance of the magician left the audience in awe.
